title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Al Michaels on Working with Madden, "Miracle on Ice" Behind-The-Scenes, Broadcasting Future
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Al Michaels on Working with Madden, "Miracle on Ice" Behind-The-Scenes, Broadcasting Future
description:
Legendary broadcaster Al Michaels joins Colin for a great conversation about his incredible career in sports. They discuss how he made the switch from MLB to NFL play-by-play (3:00), how the Internet has changed his preparation for games (11:00), the first time he ever worked with John Madden (13:00), when he knew football had surpassed baseball as America's pastime (23:00), his future in broadcasting (26:00), his earliest memories in sports (29:00), stories from his personal life (32:00), and behind-the-scenes details from his iconic "Miracle on Ice" call (38:00).
